dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

dependencies.description:
The GNU config.guess and config.sub scripts versioned by timestamp.
This package can be used as a build dependency for autotools packages
that ship a tarball with outdated config.guess and config.sub files.
dependencies.name: gnuconfig

dependent_to.description:
BigDFT-CheSS: A module for performing Fermi Operator Expansions via
Chebyshev Polynomials.
dependent_to.name: bigdft-chess

dependent_to.description:
BigDFT-core: the core components of BigDFT, an electronic structure
calculation based on Daubechies wavelets.
dependent_to.name: bigdft-core

dependent_to.description:
BigDFT-Psolver: a flexible real-space Poisson Solver based on
Interpolating Scaling Functions. It constitutes a fundamental building
block of BigDFT code, and it can also be used separately and linked to
other codes.
dependent_to.name: bigdft-psolver

dependent_to.description:
BigDFT-spred: a library for structure prediction tools, that is compiled
on top of BigDFT routines.
dependent_to.name: bigdft-spred

dependent_to.description: Encrypted overlay filesystem written in Go
dependent_to.name: gocryptfs

description:
pkg-config is a helper tool used when compiling applications and
libraries
name: pkg-config

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
